## How does it work

- storage database: GitHub repository
- install [Giscus](https://github.com/apps/giscus) app to your GitHub repository
- enable [discussion feature](https://docs.github.com/en/repositories/managing-your-repositorys-settings-and-features/enabling-features-for-your-repository/enabling-or-disabling-github-discussions-for-a-repository) in your repo
